ngoList.title: The Rural Organisation for Social Empowerment
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: To promote, develop and provide a balanced education for the development of normal physical and intellectual power and to plan various welfare programmes for a better and brighter future of the rural people To bring together persons of various communities irrespective of religion race caste or creed by creating fostering of goodwill brotherhood peace and co-operation with the aims of promoting the international idea of understanding and co-operation in conformity with the principles and ideas of UNESCO To organize and maintain educational centers/institutions for giving training and coaching of the students belonging to weaker sections and educationally and economically backward minority communities. To establish institutions Training centers in the field of Computer Science so as to give to knowledge of modem computer technology and its appliance to the youths of minority group and other backward classes of rural backward areas of Manipur for their self reliance and employment To establish vocational training cum production centers in trades of Alurninium Foundry Weaving Tailoring, Embroidery Wool Knitting etc for giving training to the young persons of rural areas for their self employment and income generation. To provide the facility of legal aid to the people especially to the youths by holding camps seminars workshops so as to enable to bring the minds of youths who are doing anti social activities To extent voluntary services in relief works of the people affected by natural calamities disasters like famine draught fires floods hurricanes earthquakes epidemics wars etc. by launching sustainable campaigns sending volunteers and contribution assistances in each or kind. To impart and inculcate the villagers particularly the youths. the qualities of leadership discipline team-spirit. co-operation self-reliance and social justice so that they may be prepared and equpipped to work out for themselves and others a future in keeping with their own human dignity and destiny. To establish increase or spread Khadi and Village Industries within the area of the Organization and other feasible villages in the State of Manipur. To establish a training Centre for Leather Technology and to give training to the young generation in the different trades. To undertake any kind of sustainable project by framing a Sub-Committee Project Advisory Board for Socio-Economic Development for the weaker and needy section of the society. To establish institutes for handicrafts for giving instruction to the young persons for getting knowledge of various designs of Cane and Bamboo works Pottery Dairy and Carpat weaving and to establish Khadi and Village Industries Programme
